CustomField.description: The loyalty level granted to the account/contact or custom point accrual level from the previous cycle. This level becomes the starting level for the new cycle unless an override is in effect.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The loyalty level granted to the account/contact or custom point accrual level from the previous cycle. This level becomes the starting level for the new cycle unless an override is in effect.
CustomField.label: Loyalty Level (Initial)
